```{r}
access <- read.table("DD2-2D4.align_cf.3D7_DD2.ACCESS.bed")
colnames(access) <- c("chrom","st","en","var","IS","TD","VC","LD","N1","C1","L1","NM1","N2","C2","L2","MN2")
access$Imatch <- (access$IS == (access$L2-access$L1))

dim(subset(access,VC==1))
dim(subset(access,VC==1 & access$Imatch))
dim(access)

```
